attributes.additional_details:
So many parents still feel unsafe about sending their children to school as cases and death toll still extremely high. We should only
reopen schools after Easter holiday as vaccine roll out would be distributed to many more people by that time. We don’t want the virus to get out of control just like it did in Autumn because of reopening schools and many more factors
attributes.background: So many parents still feel unsafe about sending their children to school as cases and death toll still extremely high. We should only reopen schools after Easter holiday as vaccine roll out would be distributed to many more people by that time. This is to ensure the virus doesn’t get out of control

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575503.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
